com.VTC.langlib

Class Lang

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.VTC.langlib.Lang
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Instruction

    public abstract class Lang
extends java.lang.Object
implements Instruction
    Lang class, providing the framework for the main instantiable class of the new language. Mainly here to provide a superclass which will store and return all of the necessary values for the language to be able to interact with itself (and customizable usage). For the sake of being meta-language capable, Lang implements Instruction to allow it to be recognized as a command.
    Author:
    vtcakavsmoace

    • Field Detail

      • langDetails

        private LanguageDetail langDetails
        The language detailer for this language instance. May be called with getCurrentLanguageDetail, but information intended to be output may be relayed through reportLanguageDetails.

      • dataHandler

        private DataHandler dataHandler
        The data handler for this language instance. It is only here in this class for the sake of the handleInput method and to be called through getCurrentDataHandler.

      • parseHandler

        private ParseHandler parseHandler
        The parsing handler for this language instance. May be called with getCurrentParseHandler.

      • args

        private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> args
        The arguments for this language instance. This will change during runtime to accomodate for flags.

      • instructions

        private java.util.ArrayList<? extends Instruction> instructions
        The instructions to reference when this language instance is executed.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Lang

        public Lang(LanguageDetail langDetails,
            DataHandler dataHandler,
            ParseHandler parseHandler,
            java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> args)
        Standard constructor for language instance. Note that all parameters except for the command line arguments will not be binding and may be replaced with the respective set methods.
        Parameters:
        langDetails - An instance of the LanguageDetails class desired to be used for this language instance. May be replaced with setCurrentLanguageDetail and retrieved with getCurrentLanguageDetail
        dataHandler - An instance of the DataHandler class desired to be used for this language instance. May be replaced with setCurrentDataHandler and retrieved with getCurrentDataHandler.
        parseHandler - An instance of the ParseHandler class desired to be used for this language instance. May be replaced with setCurrentParseHandler and retrieved with getCurrentParseHandler.
        args - The arguments passed from the command line, but may be altered beforehand.

    • Method Detail

      • configureInput

        private void configureInput(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> args)
        Helper method for .execute which calls upon the data handler to handle any command line arguments that are not flags.
        Parameters:
        args - The arguments passed from the command line after the flags have been configured.

      • configureFlags

        private void configureFlags(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> args)
        Helper method for .execute which handles all flags that DataHandler verifies is a valid flag, handling according to DataHandler's specification.
        Parameters:
        args - The arguments passed from the command line, exactly as passed.

      • execute

        public void execute()
        Description copied from interface: Instruction
        Provided as a method to enact instructions specified by the implementation of Instruction. This method will be called by Lang or by any other member of the language capable of enacting instructions.
        Specified by:
        execute in interface Instruction

      • configureInstructions

        private void configureInstructions(java.lang.String filename)
        When passed a string, this will request that the ParseHandler parse the file by the name of the given string, proceding to set the current instruction list to the instructions which it returns.
        Parameters:
        filename - The name of the file for the ParseHandler to parse.
